1.content:
What type of aura do you have is it a common aura such as

Fire
Water
Earth
Lightning
Sound
Ice
ect

Or is it a Rare Aura such as

Metal
Light
Dark
Mind-Control (Only works on Non-aura people, also tends to have ether Fire or Ice as a back up aura)


Or maybe you are the one of the first aura user to have more then one aura?

You can also if you wish can bring in a power from a other anime or manga.
1.title: What is your Aura

11.content: Are you a boy or girl
11.title: What is your Gender

112.content:
You seem to run on a beach, but you don’t know were you are or how you got there, but then you look at the ocean you see that the Sun and moon are both on the horizon.

‘How’ you wonder as you look at the horizon, ‘How am I having the “Para-Dream” only aura users have this dream and the last time I had a aura check, it said I did not have a aura.’

Then you hear a voice behind you, as you turn around you see a Man in his late 20’s early 30’s beckoning at you.

‘I thought you were supposed to be alone in an aura dream.’ You wonder as you walk towards the man.

As you get close you ask “Who are you?”

The man replies “It does not matter; chances are we will not meet again even here.”

“Ok… then why am I here if I don’t have an aura?” You ask hopping he would answer this question.

“You’re here because your aura has just awakened.” He answered with a kind smile on his face.

“Then why are you here, I heard that aura users were always alone on the beach?” You ask trying to get more answers from the man.

“That is because I am the one who is awakening your powers.” The man says again with a slight smile on his face.

“What how can a man awaken an aura?” You say very confused about what you just heard.

“We don’t have time to talk anymore your body is beginning to wake up.” The man then pulls out 2 orbs from his body one was gave off a warm glow of light, but the other was black and absorbed the heat. The black one was bigger then the one that gave of light, you were amazed when the black one seemed to open up as the man put the other in it and closed the black one.

The man began to speak again “This is for you.” He said as he put the now glowing black orb in your body.

“Now I am free to go look for my beloved Mew.” The man said as he seemed to just disappeared.

Than it happened the beach started to disappear as well and soon your were surrounded by darkness.

You were scared in that darkness but then you heard a voice but this time it was a voice you knew very well.

“Dad” you shout. “Dad were are you”

Then your eyes open and you hear your name being called.
112.title: The dream

choices: Don't Tell them about the dream
1121.content:
“SAKURA, you woke up I’m… I’m… I’m so happy.” Your dad says as he hugs you as tears come down his eyes. “I thought I lost you like I did your mother.” As he said that you also get sad, it had been 10 years since your mom died, you were only 5 at the time so you did not know what “died” meant only that you could not see your mom anymore. On her death bed she made your dad promise to protect her baby girl.

Your dad promised, and kept it for the past 10 years; nothing in your life has ever hurt you. Not even your neighbors big, mean dog when it went mad and broke through the fence into your back yard, where you were playing dolls when you where 7. The dog snarled at you and made you cry. That was when your dad came out of nowhere and gave the dog a stare that made it seem like a bug. The dog ran away after that and your dad got you an Ice-cream to make you fell better. Yes your dad is one of the nicest people you know even if he is a little weird. By weird you mean he acts like Ichigo’s dad. (Bleach)

“Sakura what happened to you, you fell unconscious during school?” your dad asks before saying “Your friend Nina and her twin brother Max carried you here from the track field.”

“They did I’m going to have to thank them.” You said as you tried to get up.

“Oo, no you don’t.” said a woman’s voice from the other side of the curtain. It was in fact the school nurse “You passed out during P,E so I’m going to have to ask you to rest for a bit while I talk to your dad.” Then the nurse saw the look in your eyes, so she said “I will call Nina and Max for you.”

“Thank you” you said to the nurse.

Nina and Max were there in 7 minutes
“Sakura, are you ok.” They both ask at the same time. Nina came up and hugged you, Max who valued his life did not touch you because your over -protective dad was so close, the last time he hugged you in front of your dad he was 9 and some how he “Slipped” and fell down the steps, your dad said he “tried” to stop it but was too late. After that Max has never touched you with in a mile of your dad, you always thought it funny because you never put 2 and 2 together. Even after that Max never hated you, he was just scared of your dad.

After about 30 minutes of talking with your friends they had to go back to class. As they left your dad and the nurse came back in. Your dad had a worried expression on his face. The nurse was the first to talk.

“Sakura, I don’t know how to put this but it seems that when you passed out you developed an aura… Not only that but I can’t seem to be able to say what type of aura you have.”

At that moment you remembered your dream, the “Para-Dream” that you had.
1121.title: Your name is Sakura

121.title: Fire

info.brief_description: This is a story of Psychic Adademy, After the Manga not the Anime.
info.description:
This is a story of what happens after the Psychic Academy Manga. So read the manga before you add.

Rules-
•Long chapters no one sentence crap.
Ex- And so he threw a fireball
None of that must be at least 2 pages long on Microsoft Word unless it is an Aura or a Question. Ex- Do you go left or right? Or do you have a fire aura?

•Spell-check before add
•Use words not online lingo
Ex-Lol, omg,ect will not be allowed
There can be sex parts but please don’t over do it. The story is action not a porno
•Always give away out of deaths reach. Ex- don’t have one chapter lead to death with out the option of life.
•The main character(you) may not die
•No BoyxBoy but GirlxGirl is ok

Back story-

It has been 10 years since Ai and his big brother Zero have gone missing. The A,D,C is still looking for Ai and his power of Light but even they have no clue as to were they are hiding.

There are many rumors, some say that they are helping the world, other say that they have left Earth and went to the Para-dream world, No one knows for sure.

Aura users are still a small percent of the worlds population, There is about 1 aura user for ever 150 normal human being. A,D,C is still trying to make aura users by science but they hit a stand still in there research 8 years ago when all there experiments died of aura manipulation.

You are starting your freshmen year at the Psychic Academy but the question is what type of aura do you use?
